ext_weather.name: Today
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Snow before 1pm, then snow and sleet between 1pm and 5pm, then sleet and a slight chance of snow. Cloudy, with a high near 35. Northeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 7 to 11 inches possible.
